purpose: Position Titanverse as the solution to pharmacy chaos through narrative-driven animated explainer, contrasting fragmented systems with unified platform that brings clarity and flow to pharmacy operations.
core_message: When everything moved into Titanverse, the goal wasn't more tech. It was to make digital actually work for the pharmacy. This is what real digital progress feels like.
summary: AI-animated composited explainer video telling the story of pharmacy chaos (scattered information, disconnected systems, repeated work) transitioning to clarity through Titanverse unified platform (consultations, prescribing, payments, compliance in one space, faster decisions, smooth team flow).
